text: Ibbin Samaan () is a small town in western Aleppo Governorate, northwestern Syria. With a population of 6,220 as per the 2004 census, the town is the administrative center of Nahiya Ibbin Samaan. Ibbin Samaan is the administrative center of Nahiya Ibbin Samaan in Atarib District. ==References==
title: Ibbin Samaan
